content: Fright Cliff is one of two possible second main regions of Chapter 2 in the Yellow Wind Ridge of Black Myth: Wukong. Below you'll find a guide for the Fright Cliff Region and its side quests for the Man-in-Stone and Yellow-Robed Squire, as well as how to defeat its many bosses that include the Mother of Stones and Stone Vanguard to get the Sterness of Stone.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fright_Cliff_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Fright Cliff Walkthrough'.
The content is as follows:
Fright Cliff is one of two possible second main regions of Chapter 2 in the Yellow Wind Ridge of Black Myth: Wukong. Below you'll find a guide for the Fright Cliff Region and its side quests for the Man-in-Stone and Yellow-Robed Squire, as well as how to defeat its many bosses that include the Mother of Stones and Stone Vanguard to get the Sterness of Stone.
